Class Ezvcard.WriterChainHtml

java.lang.Object
  ezvcard.Ezvcard.WriterChainHtml
Enclosing class:
Ezvcard
public static class Ezvcard.WriterChainHtml
extends Object

Convenience chainer class for writing HTML vCards (hCard).
